ai.summary: An easy 3.5 km circular hike in the UK starting and finishing near Burgh Castle. The route offers flat terrain, open coastal views, and a chance to glimpse the nearby Roman fort remains.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat with grassy and gravel surfaces; several short sections may be muddy after rain; expect exposed coastal winds and sea spray along the route.
ai.safety_notes: Check tide times and weather before you go. Stay on signed paths, watch for uneven ground and slippery patches, and avoid cliff edges. Dress for wind and sun exposure; keep dogs under control and carry water.
recommended_gear: Map, GPS or fully charged phone
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (best in warm, dry conditions)

seo.title: Burgh Castle Circular Walk – Easy 3.5 km Coastal Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover the easy 3.5 km Burgh Castle Circular in the UK. Flat terrain, coastal views, and a glimpse of Roman history—perfect for a short, scenic day hike.
